thread.title: Steve

author: Steve
title: Steve
text: Transferwise just converted some USD from my UK based currency account into Sterling and wired it into my sterling account on the same day. Having used Transferwise before, I already knew they were trustworthy and have great rates. On this occasion, they provided over 2% better currency rate than my bank could offer, saving me over Â£700 on the transaction. Result!
